document.full_text: macy's inc  regained its investment grade debt rating on wednesday from standard & poor's, which cited the retailer's "robust performance, with results ahead of peers."
document.title: macy's regains s&p investment grade after two years
lines_and_colors: macy's inc  regained its investment grade debt rating on wednesday from standard & poor's, which cited the retailer's "robust performance, with results ahead of peers."
